  • In the ports of Len regions, there is increased willingness and disguise

    Special measures for the prevention of CC have been published on the Baltic Sea Sea Sea Sea Sea Sea Sea Sea Sea Sea Sea Sea Sea Sea Sea Ports website. These are ports in Ust-Luga (Kingisep district), Primorsk, Vassok and Choborg (Vyborg region).

    05.02.2024
  • FSB prevents the attack against one of the leaders Crime

    Suspects have been removed by a radio-controlled improvised explosive device (IED) of cumulative action, as well as by IED of fragmentation fusation, remote detonator.

    05.02.2024
  • The body of a member of the crew of a broken MI-8 helicopter was raised from the Lake of Onez.

    The body of one of the pilots has been lifted today. Who's not found yet. The MI-8 is located at the bottom of the lake 10 kilometres from the village of the village of the village of the village of the village of the village of the Prionez region.

    05.02.2024
  • In Saransk, the plane went outside the strip. Tatiana Tarasov was on board.

    On Monday, 5 February, at 20:34, at Zaransk airport, the Superjet 100 Rosia airline crashed right from the airstrip. This happened after the landing: the liner fell 10 metres from the strip.

    05.02.2024
  • Well, that's 8:0. The jury pronounced a verdict for double murder in Len regionalia.

    The jury took a little less than an hour to conclude that the resident of the village of Jeremina Gora Tivin district, the 41-year-old Andrei Sirotkin, was guilty of the death of the 50-year-old Igor Kolosov and his 43-year-old friend Lubovia Suchotsky.

    05.02.2024
  • The police are looking for a whistle-blower. He said the teacher cut a colleague at Picalev's school.

    As 47news has become known, in the morning of 5 February 112, a call was received from a teacher at Picalev school. The child's voice said that an informant teacher stabbed another teacher and left school.

    05.02.2024
  • ISA bombed a summer kitchen on a Hutora in the Belgorod region

    No survivors. There's a direct hit in the summer kitchen of private housekeeping, which is why it burned.

    05.02.2024
  • Under the Boxytogaard Reno, he flew to the dawn. A woman died.

    According to preliminary figures 47news, about half of the sixth evening on 5 February, an accident occurred on 416 kilometres of track A-114, " New Ladoga " , under Boxytogoris. Reno Logan's car flew into the dive.

    05.02.2024
  • The submarine found the hull of an MILF helicopter crashing into Carelia.

    MI-8 ceased to be in contact on Sunday, during a training flight along the route of Peski Airport from Petrozavodska - Vetegra Airport (Worological Region) over the Lake Onez.

    05.02.2024

    The fraudsters are attacking the Rossians in Telegram. In an attempt to steal them, the culprits are responsible for the administration of the Messenger, the support service, etc.

    All six devices are manufactured by a high-level specialist and are designed to be seriously damaged. The timers were placed at the same time in the Moscow time belt, referred to in Georgia ' s State Security.

    05.02.2024
  • A small child with alcohol poisoning was taken from the apartment in the Choborg.

    The child ' s family is known to the police and local guardianship authorities. The circumstances of the incident are being investigated.

    05.02.2024
  • In a bakery attack in Lisichansk, the Minister of the PSU died.

    Among those killed as a result of the shooting of the bakery in Lisićansk, Minister of Emergency Situations Aleksey's L.R.

    05.02.2024
  • The woman was injured by shelling in the White City village of Tetkino

    Governor Roman Starovat said that the village of Tetkino in the Kur province had been shelled by Ukraine. We've all counted five flights. A local resident was shot at by fragmentation.

    05.02.2024
  • The cars in the bruises, the screamers pulled out. Three were injured in the New Rops accident.

    According to the Fontanke in the police station, three people were injured by the accident, and they were taken to the hospital in a state of medium gravity.

    05.02.2024
  • A tattooed man is detained for a professional blow on a wing in Gatchin.

    There were two men fighting at home number 10 on the Aviator Boulevard. The camera at the entrance was filmed as an aggressor hit a 40-year-old pilot in the face, and he rolled off the porch and didn't get up long.

    05.02.2024
  • My son and dad died in a car crash under Tivin.

    The 44-year-old Mazda BT-50 pick-up driver reportedly took a drive to the ditch, after which the car turned and crashed into a tree. The driver and his 68-year-old father died on the spot. The passengers were 70 and 76 years old.

    05.02.2024
  • On board the fallen MI-8 in Carelia, there were members of the PHS of Vegtra. Consideration of several causes of disaster

    The Mi-8 helicopter crash site was found, but the bodies of three crew members are not yet available. Emergency services told the media about the alleged causes of the disaster.

    05.02.2024
